feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
